description: This course is intended for those with no prior background in folklore or knowledge of various cultures. Texts range in age from the first century to the twentieth, and geographically from the Middle East to Europe to the United States. Each collection displays various techniques of collecting folk materials and making them concerete. Each in its own way also raises different issues of genre, legitimacy, canon formation, cultural values and context.
name: GREAT STORY COLLECTIONS

values.comments: Professor Azzolina received extremely positive reviews.  Students commented that he was “very knowledgeable and caring,” “a riot,” and that he stimulated the students\' intellectual interests.  Although some felt that he should have more control over the class, most thought that the class is a great pick even for those who have different majors.
